de.griefed.serverpackcreator.curseforgemodpack

Class CurseModpack

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.curseforgemodpack.CurseModpack

  • public class CurseModpack
extends java.lang.Object
    Table of methods
    getMinecraft()
    setMinecraft(List)
    getName()
    setName(String)
    getVersion()
    setVersion(String)
    getAuthor()
    setAuthor(String)
    getFiles()
    setFiles(List)
    toString()

    Retrieve information about a CurseForge Minecraft modpack by using com.fasterxml.jackson.databind JSON parsing. This class retrieves the name, version and author of a modpack.

    • Field Detail

      • minecraft

        private java.util.List<CurseMinecraft> minecraft
        Ignore unknown values/object. We only want to gather specific information and disregard the rest. Setting this property allows us setup the class to only gather the information we want, so we don't have to worry about any additions to the source-data being made, which would otherwise cause an "Unknown property" exception.

        private java.lang.String name

        private java.lang.String version

      • getFiles

        public java.util.List<CurseFiles> getFiles()
        Getter for the files on which the CurseForge modpack depends by using CurseFiles.
        Returns:
        List CurseFiles. Returns an instance of CurseFiles.class with information related to the files included in the CurseForge modpack.

        public java.lang.String toString()

        Overrides:
